pages.text: Despite being undead, these wolves still hunger for bones and will chase and scare off Skeletons. When they managed to kill a Skeleton, they would heal 1 Heart of damage. Should one be clad in Necro Robes and summon an Undead Wolf, the Wolf has more health and can be ordered to sit like a regular tamed wolf. They can also be healed using a Rotten Flesh or Bone. An undead pet for a master of undeath.
One can call these creatures through the use of a $(l:focuses/hounding_focus)Hounding Focus$(), or through a ritual which summons one without a limited lifespan.
